page.title: 12SCHOOL IN CUMBERNAULD _ 2
page.content: My school{(St. Maurice's High)}was opened in{1976.}There are{950 pupils} at present. The school is well planned, with modern facilities such as a swimming pool,gymnasium,dance studio,games hall,theatre,football and hockey pitches. School begins at 9.00 am with assembly then straight to our first class (which is R.E. on a Monday). This period lasts 65 minutes then a bell rings for us to move to period 2 (History) for one hour. We then have a 15 minute interval followed by 15 minutes registration. Period 3 (P.E., or Latin for some) lasts 1 hour taking us to our lunch hour. Most people have a packed lunch then we spend the rest of the time in the yard. The afternoon begins with English for 65 minutes and finishes with an hour of Science.
